metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9274 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A shell command injection in the obs-service-source_validator before 0.7 could be used to execute code as the packager when checking RPM SPEC files with specific macro constructs.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

osc - 0.162.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: osc package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.162.1-1').
